input.label: Filter OS Type:
input.default: | search [ search `nmon_config` | search AIX_LEVEL=* | stats count by hostname | fields hostname ]

choice.value: | search [ search `nmon_config` | search AIX_LEVEL=* | stats count by hostname | fields hostname ]

input.label: Select a Host:
input.populatingSearch: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data | stats count by hostname | dedup hostname | sort hostname $osfilter$

chart.title: CPU Usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" OR type="LPAR" $hostname$ | eval lpar_vpconso=round(((VP_User_PCT+VP_Sys_PCT+VP_Wait_PCT+VP_Idle_PCT)*virtualCPUs/100),2) | eval cpu_pctconso=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | stats values(lpar_vpconso) As lpar_vpconso, values(cpu_pctconso) As cpu_pctconso by _time,hostname | eval conso=if(isnotnull(lpar_vpconso),lpar_vpconso,cpu_pctconso) | timechart `inline_customspan` max(conso) As "CPU Usage"

chart.title: I/O Per second
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As iosec by _time,hostname | timechart `inline_customspan` max(iosec) As "IO Per sec"

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % by category
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan` avg(Sys_PCT) As Sys_PCT, avg(User_PCT) As User_PCT, avg(Wait_PCT) As Wait_PCT, avg(Idle_PCT) As Idle_PCT

chart.title: CPU_ALL, % global usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="CPU_ALL" $hostname$ | eval cpu_PCT=(Sys_PCT+User_PCT+Wait_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan` max(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Max Usage", avg(cpu_PCT) As "%CPU Avg Usage"

chart.title: LPAR, Virtual CPU usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="LPAR" $hostname$ | `lpar_define_conso` | timechart `inline_customspan` max(lpar_vpconso) As max_vpconso, avg(lpar_vpconso) As avg_vpconso, max(entitled) As Entitled, max(virtualCPUs) As virtualCPUs

chart.title: LPAR, Pools Virtual CPU usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="LPAR" $hostname$ | `lpar_define_conso` | where pool_conso>0 AND pool_conso<poolCPUs | timechart `inline_customspan` max(pool_conso) As max_poolconso, avg(pool_conso) As avg_poolconso, max(poolCPUs) As poolCPUs

chart.title: TOP, CPU Usage per logical core
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,pct_CPU,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where pct_CPU<=limit | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | eval conso_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(conso_per_core) As conso_per_core by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan` useother=f limit=0 max(conso_per_core) as "CPU Usage per core" by Command

chart.title: TOP: Memory Usage per command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,PID,Command,ResText,ResData,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats count(Command) As count, avg(ResText) As ResText, sum(ResData) As ResData by _time,hostname,Command | eval Used_Mem_MB=((ResData+ResText)/1024) | stats sum(Used_Mem_MB) As Used_Mem_MB by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan` useother=f limit=0 max(Used_Mem_MB) as "Used_Memory" by Command

chart.title: TOP: Read / Write System Calls
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,CharIO,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(CharIO) As CharIO by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan` useother=f limit=0 max(CharIO) as "I/O" by Command

chart.title: TOP: Paging, Sum of page faults
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,Paging,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(Paging) As Paging by _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan` useother=f limit=0 max(Paging) as "Paging" by Command

chart.title: TOP: Threads per Command invocation
chart.searchString: index=nmon sourcetype=nmon_data type=TOP $hostname$ | dedup _time,Threads,PID,Command,hostname | bucket _time span=1s | stats sum(Threads) As Threads By _time,Command | timechart `inline_customspan` useother=f limit=0 max(Threads) as Threads by Command

chart.title: FILE, Read/Write system calls
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="FILE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(readch) As readch, max(writech) As writech

chart.title: FILE, Various statistics
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="FILE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(iget) As iget, max(namei) As namei, max(dirblk) As dirblk

chart.title: IOADAPT, Read/Write Operations (Kbytes/sec)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="IOADAPT" $hostname$ device!=*tps* value>=0 | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: IOADAPT, Total I/O Operations (tps)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="IOADAPT" $hostname$ device=*tps* value>=0 | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: PROC, Kernel Threads in run queue and to be paged (RunQueue, Swap-In)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(Runnable) As "RunQueue", max(Swap_in) As "Swap_in"

chart.title: PROC, Context switches and system calls (pswitch, syscall)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(pswitch) As "pswitch/sec", max(syscall) As "syscall/sec"

chart.title: PROC, Fork and Exec system calls (fork, exec)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PROC" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(fork) As "pswitch/sec", max(exec) As "exec/sec"

chart.title: PAGE, Pages In / Pages Out (pgsin / pgsout)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PAGE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(pgsin) As "pgsin", max(pgsout) As "pgsout"

chart.title: PAGE, Fs In / Fs Out (sum of pgin/pgsin and pgout/pgsout per interval)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PAGE" $hostname$ | eval fsin=(pgin+pgsin) | eval fsout=(pgout+pgsout) | timechart `inline_customspan` Max(fsin) As "fsin", Max(fsout) As "fsout"

chart.title: PAGE, Scan Free Ratio (Pages scans by reclaims per interval)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="PAGE" $hostname$ | eval scanfree=round((scans/reclaims),2) | timechart `inline_customspan` max(scanfree) As scanfree_ratio | fillnull value="0"

chart.title: MEM, Real Memory usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval Real_used_MB=round(((Real_total_MB-Real_free_MB)),0) | timechart `inline_customspan` Max(Real_total_MB) As Real_total_MB, Max(Real_used_MB) As Real_used_MB

chart.title: MEM, Paging Space usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEM" $hostname$ | eval Virtual_used_MB=round(((Virtual_total_MB-Virtual_free_MB)),0) | timechart `inline_customspan` Max(Virtual_total_MB) As Virtual_total_MB, Max(Virtual_used_MB) As Virtual_used_MB

chart.title: MEMNEW, % Memory Allocation by category
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMNEW" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` avg(FScache_PCT) As FScache_PCT, avg(Process_PCT) As Process_PCT, avg(System_PCT) As System_PCT, avg(Free_PCT) As Free_PCT

chart.title: MEMNEW, % Memory Usage
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMNEW" $hostname$ | eval memused_PCT=(FScache_PCT+Process_PCT+System_PCT) | timechart `inline_customspan` avg(memused_PCT) As memused_PCT

chart.title: MEMUSE, Vmtune Statistics
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="MEMUSE" $hostname$ | timechart `inline_customspan` max(PCTnumperm) As PCTnumperm, max(PCTminperm) As PCTminperm, max(PCTmaxperm) As PCTmaxperm

chart.title: DISKBSIZE, Average data transfer size
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBSIZE" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As avg_transfer_size by _time | timechart `inline_customspan` max(avg_transfer_size) As avg_transfer_size

chart.title: DISKBUSY, Disk Busy Activity
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKBUSY" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As busy_time by _time | timechart `inline_customspan` max(busy_time) As busy_time

chart.title: DISKREAD, Disk Read Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKREAD" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As read_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan` max(read_data_rate) As read_data_rate

chart.title: DISKWRITE, Disk Write Data Rate
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKWRITE" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As write_data_rate by _time | timechart `inline_customspan` max(write_data_rate) As write_data_rate

chart.title: DISKXFER, Disk I/O Operations per second (IOPS)
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="DISKXFER" $hostname$ | stats sum(value) As IOPS by _time | timechart `inline_customspan` max(IOPS) As IOPS

chart.title: JFSFILE, Percentage Usage of File-systems
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="JFSFILE" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 useother=f `inline_customspan` avg(value) As pct_fs_used by device

chart.title: JFSINODE, Inode Percentage Usage of File-systems
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="JFSINODE" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 useother=f `inline_customspan` avg(value) As pct_inode_used by device

chart.title: NET - Network Interfaces Activity by Host
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NET" $hostname$ | eval rate=round((value/1000),2) | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan` max(rate) As rate by device

chart.title: NETPACKET - Number of read/write packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETPACKET" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan` max(value) As value by device

chart.title: NETERROR - Number of errors packets
chart.searchString: index="nmon" sourcetype="nmon_data" type="NETERROR" $hostname$ | timechart limit=0 `inline_customspan` max(value) As value by device
